title: FS/T: T206 Billy Sullivan PSA 5 PRICE REDUCED!
author: quinnsryche

posts.post_title: FS/T: T206 Billy Sullivan PSA 5 PRICE REDUCED!
posts.post_content:
Not doing PSA's any more, only SGC's. This is my only PSA and it's a nice one. I would be willing to do one of the following:
1. Sell outright $85 ($15 less than what I paid) or
2. Trade for a Sullivan graded SGC 50 +$15 or
3. Trade for any other T206 SGC 50's or 60's I need.
Let me know what you have, send scans to: [url]quinnsryche@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks!
